title: 2018  Mallard UltraLite 27' Travel Trailer
item_description:
2018 Mallard UltraLite 27' Travel Trailer

  • Year: 2018
  • Manufacturer: Heartland
  • Model: Mallard IDM26
  • Length: 27’
  • Vin: 5SFNB3224JN352774
  • License #: 1MV8577
    • Expiration Date: 6/30/2025
  • GVWR: 8600lbs
  • Key: Available
  • Tire Size: ST225/75R15
  • Number of Popouts: 1
  • Number of Couches: 1
  • Number of Beds: 3
  • Sleeps: 5
  • Kitchen Features:
    • Kitchen Sink
    • 2 Way Propane/Electric Refrigerator
    • Propane Stove
    • Propane Oven
  • Bathroom Features:
    • Full Bathroom
    • Walk In shower
    • Sink
    • Toilet
  • Number of Light Fixtures: 13
  • Number of Cabinet/Storage Spaces: 10
  • General Features:
    • Air Conditioning
    • Propane Heater
    • Flat Panel TV Awning

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
